quest.name: Pirate Stew
journal: Hirase is pondering what to make the Confederates for dinnerbreakfastlunch.
objectives: Obtain slabs of hearty gyuki meat from gyuki.
Deliver the slabs of hearty gyuki meat to Hirase.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Bah! You scared me! I was just contemplating what to make the hungry men and women of Onokoro for dinnerbreakfastlunch. As the resident chef, it is my responsibility to see that they are provided with good, nutritious meals.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: I think today we will be having a pirate's stew. Makes your mouth water, doesn't it?

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Problem is, I am missing a key ingredient. <sigh> Our revenue from the Ruby Tithe has been slowly declining and the treasurer has cut down on my budget. I am now unable to afford the juicy meat that makes this stew a proper pirate's stew.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Regardless, it is my job to find a way to keep our pirates healthy and full. That means I must find an alternative way to procure my meats. Perhaps you could assist me?

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: To the west of here are wild gyuki. Might you kill a few and bring me back slabs of this meat? In the meantime, I will go and search the sea for other foods to put into the stew.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Please bring back a few slabs of meat from the wild gyuki wandering to the west of here.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: You have brought me back my meat? Fantastic! Simply fantastic! With this, my stew is now complete!

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Do you smell that, my good ladyman? Now, that is the smell of a proper meal!

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Once we slide the hot stones into the pot, and the seawater begins to boil the seafood and meat, the already heavenly aroma will become all the sweeter!

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: We have the Ruby Sea to thank for such a luxurious bounty. By her we are blessed and in partaking of her food we shall be protectedâ”€unless you are foolish enough to swallow one of the hot stones, that is! Hahaha!

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Thank you for your help, my friend. I hope this shall suffice as payment for your services.
